name: Blue Line
description:
Fully multiplayer game.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • C - Crouch
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
  • Keys 1 and 2 | Switch primary/secondary weapon
  • R - Reload weapon
  • V - Melee attack
  • G - Primary grenade
  • F - Vault
  • Escape-  Open in-game menu
  • E - Interact (In Development)
  • Tab - Scoreboard (In Development)
System Requirements

OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities. CPU:  with SSE2 instruction set support.

Processor:  Intel Core i5 2500 / AMD FX 8350  or better. 

Memory:  4 GB RAM Graphics:  Geforce GTX 570 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 or better. 

Storage:  1 GB available space.
